text: Hiyaa! In a module, is there a way to print all the choices of a choice field?
No that is not possible. Can you describe the use case that you  would want it to be displaying all at the same time?

hello sir, thanks for the tips you helped me a lot. btw trying to figure out on the on the Deal owner it shows only numbers how to get the value text of the owner sir I put a code like this "HubSpot_owner_id".
No problem, you're going to need to use the owners api to pull in information about the owners <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/owners#endpoint?spec=GET-/crm/v3/owners/>
You can get all the information of the owner by they're id
I see sir thanks. Can you help me where I can insert that code cURL thing sir and where I can get YOUR_ACCESS _TOKEN code too
So that cURL thing and that access token allow for reading HubSpot data so you never want that on the front end.
Honestly for you I would suggest just creating a HubDB table with all the owner information
the primary key should be the owner id

<@UBT0AHWLD> making a module that loops multiple partners and that should be filterable based on region, country and products, which are choice fields

But by the sound of it i need to opt for a hubdb instead
Reminder: Used to PHP and are looking to learn HubL? Hereâ€™s a comparison: <https://youtu.be/xKjozJNzWSk>
